channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title:
视频： 米开朗基罗的《大卫》在佛罗伦萨享受水疗。
每隔两个月，米开朗基罗 1504 年完成的《大卫》雕像都要在佛罗伦萨的阿卡德米亚美术馆（Accademia Gallery）进行一次仔细的清洗。他的私人修复师埃莱奥诺拉-普奇（Eleonora Pucci）爬上脚手架近距离观看，这是为保护这座文艺复兴时期的圣像所必须进行的监测和清洁工作的一部分，去年有超过 200 万游客参观了这座圣像。
item.description:
VIDEO: Michelangelo's David gets spa treatment in Florence.

Every two months, Michelangelo's statue of David, completed in 1504, undergoes a careful cleaning at its home in Florence's Accademia Gallery, where it has resided for over 150 years. His personal restorer, Eleonora Pucci, climbs on a scaffolding for an up-close view -- part of a monitoring and cleaning ritual necessary for the preservation of the Renaissance icon visited by over two million visitors last year

item.title:
"这是纳瓦尔尼的一种形式"
特朗普周二将自己的法律麻烦与上周死于狱中的俄罗斯反对派人士阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼受到的迫害相提并论。 他没有提到普京
item.description:
"It's a form of Navalny."

Trump on Tuesday compared his own legal troubles with the persecution of Russian opposition figure Alexei Navalny, who died in prison last week. He did not mention Putin

u.afp.com/5NLr

Homeward bound.

@AFP's Jorge Guerrero photographs the release of Iberian lynxes in the Sierra de Arana mountain range in Iznalloz, Spain.

Five Iberian lynxes, one female, named Unica and four males named Urki, Uivo, Ursin and Ukendo, were released on February 20, 2024 in a mountainous area of the Andalusian province of Granada, as part of the "LIFE Lynx Connect" project to repopulate this native species from the Iberian Peninsula in the ecosystems most adapted to its characteristics

item.title:
缺雨让意大利喘不过气来。
周二，米兰和伦巴第大区的其他八个城市禁止汽车上路，因为意大利各地缺雨加剧了污染并引发了干旱。
item.description:
Lack of rain leaves Italy gasping.

Cars were banned from roads on Tuesday in Milan and eight other cities across Lombardy as a lack of rain across Italy exacerbates pollution and sparks droughts

u.afp.com/5NLB

item.title: 美国检察官在期待已久的审判结案陈词中告诉陪审员，涉嫌谋杀杰姆-杰伊（Jam Master Jay）的凶手是刽子手，他们伏击 Run-DMC 成员是毒品纠纷的一部分
item.description: The alleged murderers of Jam Master Jay were executioners who ambushed the Run-DMC member as part of a drug dispute, US prosecutors told jurors during closing arguments of the long-awaited trial u.afp.com/5NLn

item.title: 在本月举行的选举未能产生决定性获胜者之后，巴基斯坦的两个王朝政党宣布了一项权力分享协议，谢巴兹-谢里夫（Shehbaz Sharif）将重返总理宝座。
item.description: Pakistan's two dynastic parties announced a power-sharing agreement that is set to return Shehbaz Sharif to the premiership after an election this month failed to produce a decisive winner u.afp.com/5NLs

item.title: R to @AFP：#UPDATE 欧盟称已就反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼在狱中死亡一事召见俄罗斯驻布鲁塞尔代办
item.description: #UPDATE The European Union said that it had summoned the Russian charge d'affaires in Brussels over the death in prison of opposition leader Alexei Navalny u.afp.com/5NLP

item.title:
R to @AFP：#最新消息：莫斯科一家法院称，被监禁的美国记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）将至少被审前拘留至 3 月 30 日，因为他的一名双重国籍公民被单独逮捕。
同时，俄罗斯禁止了美国资助的自由欧洲电台/自由电台
item.description:
#UPDATE A Moscow court said jailed US journalist Evan Gershkovich would remain in pre-trial detention until at least March 30, as a dual citizen was separately arrested.

Meanwhile Russia banned US-funded Radio Free Europe/ Radio Liberty u.afp.com/5NLd

item.title: 根据法新社看到的法庭文件，一名海地法官起诉了数十人，指控他们参与了 2021 年总统约韦内尔-莫伊兹的暗杀事件，其中包括他的遗孀、一名前总理和一名前警察局长。
item.description: A Haitian judge has indicted dozens of people over alleged involvement in the 2021 assassination of president Jovenel Moise, including his widow, a former prime minister and an ex-police chief, according to court documents seen by AFP u.afp.com/5NLA

item.title: R to @AFP：#英国亿万富翁吉姆-拉特克利夫（Jim Ratcliffe）在其购买曼联少数股份的交易完成后表示，成为曼联的共同所有者是一种 "巨大的荣誉 "和 "责任"。
item.description: #UPDATE British billionaire Jim Ratcliffe said becoming a co-owner of Manchester United is a "great honour" and "responsibility" after his purchase of a minority stake was finalised u.afp.com/5NLQ

item.title: 视频：俄罗斯攻占乌克兰东部重镇阿夫迪耶夫卡后，附近 Selydove 的居民正在猜测他们是否会成为下一个目标
item.description: VIDEO: Following Russia's capture of the key eastern Ukrainian town of Avdiivka, people in nearby Selydove are wondering if they will be next

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院裁定子宫外的冷冻胚胎是 "儿童"，这一裁定招致白宫和美国顶级不孕不育协会的批评，该协会称这一裁定是 "可怕的发展"。
item.description: An Alabama Supreme Court ruling that frozen embryos outside the womb are "children" has drawn criticism from the White House and the top US infertility association, which called the decision a "terrifying development" u.afp.com/5NLx

item.title: #俱乐部宣布吉姆-拉特克利夫完成收购曼联 25% 的股份
item.description: #BREAKING Jim Ratcliffe completes purchase of 25 percent stake in Manchester United, club says

item.title: 索尼影业公司表示，"披头士四巨头 "又回来了，披头士乐队的每位成员都将在自己的大银幕传记片中永垂不朽，该片由萨姆-门德斯执导。
item.description: The fab four are back, with each member of the iconic Beatles to be immortalized in their own big screen biopic, all directed by Sam Mendes, Sony Pictures said u.afp.com/5NLw

item.title: 美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯在巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）将以色列的加沙行动与大屠杀相提并论并激怒以色列后数日，首次出访巴西。
item.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken headed on his first trip to Brazil, days after President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva enraged Israel by comparing its Gaza campaign to the Holocaust u.afp.com/5Nu9

item.title: 洪都拉斯前总统胡安-奥兰多-埃尔南德斯（Juan Orlando Hernandez）在纽约受审，他被控贩毒，包括通过洪都拉斯向美国转移 500 吨可卡因。
item.description: Former Honduran president Juan Orlando Hernandez went on trial in New York on charges of drug trafficking, including the transfer of 500 tons of cocaine through his country to the United States u.afp.com/5Nuj

item.title: 现年 60 岁的墨西哥女商人、反对党参议员索契特尔-加尔韦斯（Xochitl Galvez）参加了总统竞选，与执政党的前市长克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）展开了一场双女竞选
item.description: Mexican businesswoman and opposition senator Xochitl Galvez, 60, threw her hat in the ring for the presidency, setting up a two-woman race with ex-mayor Claudia Sheinbaum of the ruling party u.afp.com/5NuH

item.title: R to @AFP：#在民主时代到来三十年后，南非将于 5 月 29 日举行大选投票，这或许是对非国大统治的第一次严峻挑战。
item.description: #UPDATE Three decades after the advent of democracy, South Africa will go to the polls on May 29 for general elections and perhaps the first serious challenge to ANC rule u.afp.com/5NuD

item.title: 尼基-黑莉是唐纳德-特朗普成为美国大选共和党候选人的唯一挑战者，她发起了迄今为止最尖锐的攻击，称特朗普变得 "越来越不稳定和不正常"。
item.description: Nikki Haley, the only challenger to Donald Trump becoming the Republican Party candidate in the US election, launched her sharpest attack yet, describing him as getting "more unstable and unhinged" u.afp.com/5NuB

item.title: R to @AFP：视频：已故俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的母亲呼吁弗拉基米尔-普京总统释放儿子的遗体
item.description: VIDEO: The mother of late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny appeals to President Vladimir Putin for the release of her son's body

item.title: 美国电影界传奇人物马丁-斯科塞斯（Martin Scorsese）说，导演们应该利用技术为自己的 "声音 "服务，而不是担心技术会扼杀他们的行业。
item.description: US cinema legend Martin Scorsese says directors should harness technology to serve their "voice" rather than fearing it will kill their industry u.afp.com/5NuG

item.title: 智利一家法院表示，智利将再次努力揭开诺贝尔文学奖获得者、诗人巴勃罗-聂鲁达（Pablo Neruda）的真正死因之谜，许多人认为他是被奥古斯托-皮诺切特（Augusto Pinochet）的独裁统治毒死的。
item.description: Chile will once again try to resolve the mystery of what really killed Nobel laureate poet Pablo Neruda, who many believe was poisoned by the dictatorship of Augusto Pinochet, a court said u.afp.com/5Nuq

item.title: 纽约市警察局表示，周末在纽约地铁轨道上发现了一条腿，目前正在进行调查，以查明被肢解肢体的来源。
item.description: A leg was found on New York subway tracks over the weekend and an investigation is underway to discover the origins of the dismembered limb, the city's police department said u.afp.com/5Nuw

item.title: #欧盟就纳瓦尔尼之死传唤俄罗斯驻布鲁塞尔外交官
item.description: #BREAKING EU summons Russian diplomat in Brussels over Navalny death

item.title: 沃尔玛宣布将以 23 亿美元的价格收购智能电视制造商 Vizio，这将推动该零售巨头的广告业务增长，因为其传统业务因大流行病热潮而增长放缓。
item.description: Walmart announced it will buy smart television maker Vizio for $2.3 billion, boosting the retail giant's advertising venture as growth slows in its legacy business from the pandemic boom u.afp.com/5N6V

item.title: #南非总统称南非将于 5 月 29 日举行大选
item.description: #BREAKING South Africa to hold general election May 29, according to presidency

item.title: R to @AFP：#周二，维基解密创始人朱利安-阿桑奇（Julian Assange）因病缺席伦敦法庭，他的律师可能是英国最后一次上诉，反对将他引渡到美国以面对间谍指控 ➡️。
item.description: #UPDATE WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange was absent from a London court due to illness on Tuesday, as his lawyers launched what is likely to be a last UK bid to appeal against his extradition to the US to face espionage charges ➡️ u.afp.com/5N68

item.title: R to @AFP：#最新消息：美国周二否决了联合国安理会呼吁立即在加沙停火的决议，而美国总统拜登（Joe Biden）也面临着越来越大的压力，要求减少对以色列的支持 ⬇️。
item.description: #UPDATE The United States vetoed a UN Security Council resolution on Tuesday that called for an immediate ceasefire in Gaza, even as President Joe Biden faced mounting pressure to dial back support for Israel ⬇️ u.afp.com/5N6n

item.title: 警方称，抗议的波兰农民周二在边境撬开了两辆乌克兰货车，并将谷物洒在铁轨上，这激怒了基辅，并再次引发了邻国盟友之间的紧张关系 ➡️。
item.description: Protesting Polish farmers on Tuesday pried open two Ukrainian freight wagons on the border and spilled grain on railway tracks, police said, angering Kyiv and reigniting tensions between the neighbouring allies ➡️ u.afp.com/5N6d

item.title: R to @AFP：#已故俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的母亲周二敦促弗拉基米尔-普京总统 "立即 "释放她儿子的遗体，这是她在儿子死于北极监狱后首次发表评论 ⬇️
item.description: #UPDATE The mother of late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny urged President Vladimir Putin on Tuesday to "immediately" release the body of her son, in her first comments since his death in an Arctic prison ⬇️ u.afp.com/5N2j
